description: A standard military dogtag who identifies its wearer as a member of the armed forces, if that means something now a days. It includes basic information of the owner.
A tough jacket with lots of pockets, also it comes in a nice urban camo pattern.  Favored by the H.E.C.U.
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets, also it comes in a nice urban camo pattern.  Favored by the H.E.C.U.
An army helmet but in a nice urban camo pattern.  Favored by the H.E.C.U.
A pair of black combat boots commonly worn by the H.E.C.U.
Although not as protective as its full covered conterpart, it allows for better dexterty which the H.E.C.U finds it more important.
Based on the MOLLE backpack's design, this backpack strikes a fine balance between storage space and encumbrance, while allowing for better mobility.
